caption.p: Content of n-3 long-chain polyunsaturated fatty acids (LC-PUFA) in flesh of Scottish farmed Atlantic salmon ( Salmo salar) in 2006, 2010 and 2015, and in wild Atlantic and Pacific (Sockeye, Oncorhynchus nerka and Keta, Oncorhynchus keta) salmon. Data are presented as g n-3 LC-PUFA per 100 g flesh and are means Â± SD and are taken from Sprague et al. [ 31, 33, 34].
